card.title: Exceptional Ride Comfort
card.subtitle: Optimized Comfort Over All Terrains
card.content: The Carrie’s SR Suntour suspension fork and Schwalbe tires absorb shocks on cobblestones and uneven roads, giving you stability and comfort. Adjustable seatpost and handlebars let you fine-tune your riding position for the smoothest journey, whatever the terrain.

row.shared.feature-1-card:
Compact Shape

A bike for any time and anywhere.

Minimal parking space and tight curves: you no longer have these worries with the Carrie. Thanks to its narrow 43 cm Basic Box, you ride with the agility of a regular bike, and you’ll always find a place to park in the basement bike area. Its two-legged stand lets you safely park it even when fully loaded. When collapsed, the optional Flex Box holds up to three drinks crates—choose the MIK system carrier for extra capacity. (Loading space approved up to 80 kg; carrier approved up to 27 kg.)

Effortless Electric Power

Powerful Bosch Motor

The Carrie features a Bosch Performance Line motor that provides smooth pedal assistance up to 25 km/h. This powerful unit makes daily commutes and heavy cargo transport effortless. Its intuitive Bosch Purion display lets you adjust support levels on the fly for exactly the boost you need.

Exceptional Ride Comfort

Optimized Comfort Over All Terrains

The Carrie’s SR Suntour suspension fork and Schwalbe tires absorb shocks on cobblestones and uneven roads, giving you stability and comfort. Adjustable seatpost and handlebars let you fine-tune your riding position for the smoothest journey, whatever the terrain.

Sustainable Cargo Solutions

Environmentally Friendly Transport

The cargo box is made from 100% recyclable EPP, highlighting Riese & Müller’s commitment to sustainability. Spacious and durable, it’s ideal for kids or groceries. Optional eco-friendly accessories (child cover, tarpaulin) let you customize your setup without compromising the planet.
row.shared.option-1-card:
Intuvia 100 cockpit
The Intuvia 100 display is simple and intuitive to use and offers a perfect overview of key riding data, including distance, trip duration, range, speed and riding mode. The Intuvia 100 also provides precise information on the battery charge level as a percentage. It can be conveniently operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars..
£00.00
row.shared.option-2-card:
725 Wh Battery
Increase your range by choosing the 725Wh Battery option.
£187.00
row.shared.option-3-card:
Rear Carrier
The carrier with MIK system provides even more storage space: you can quickly and securely attach pannier racks, baskets, bike accessories, and even a dog basket, to the sturdy adapter plate. Accessories can be obtained from your dealer.
£94.00
row.shared.option-4-card:
Suspension Seatpost
The by,schulz G.2 ST parallelogram-shaped spring seatpost offers a degree of comfort that makes any dirt track feel like a freshly paved road. There are five different hardness levels of suspension element to choose from depending on the rider’s weight and comfort preferences. The neoprene cover supplied protects the suspension element from dirt.
£140.00
row.shared.option-5-card:
Chain Lock With Bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted.
£47.00
row.shared.spec-table:
Specifications

The Carrie city in detail

Frame colour anise*; aqua*; shadow*
Suspension fork SR Suntour Mobie A32 CGO, 20", 50mm
Headset Acros AZX-221, block lock; TH No. 9, semi-integrated
Seatpost JD/Riese & Müller, Alu, 34,9 x 430mm; By.Schulz G.2 ST*
Seatclamp JD, 40,0 mm, QR
Tires Schwalbe Big Ben Plus 55-406 Reflex; Schwalbe Super Moto-X 62-406
Tubes Schwalbe AV7
Rims Mach1 Trucky30 20" CNC
Spokes Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black ( 16x ); Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black ( 36x )
Front hub Novatec Disc 32H
Rear hub Shimano Nexus 5-speed, free-wheel, 36L
Battery Akku Bosch PowerPack Frame 545; Akku Bosch PowerPack Frame 725*; Akku Bosch PowerPack Frame 800*
Motor Bosch Performance Line (smart system); Bosch Performance Line Sport 20mph+*
Display Bosch Purion 200; Bosch Intuvia 100*
Crankset FSA CK-601 170mm schwarz
Chain ring 52T
Chain guard Chain guard
Chain KMC X1 ( 105x )
Pinion 30T
Saddle Selle Royal Essenza Moderate
Pedals M-Wave Steady Flat
Shifter Shimano Nexus grip shift, 5-speed
Handlebar Satori Horizon, 31,8 mm, 9°, B=620 mm
Stem Riese & Müller, adjustable height and angle
Grips Herrmans Grips Line
Brakes Magura MT4, disc brake
Front light Herrmans H-Black MR8
Tail light Büchel Z-Fire Mini
Mudguards SKS A69R; SKS A65R
Luggage rack Riese & Müller*
Rubber Bibia*
Bell Billy
Kickstand Kickstand Riese & Müller
Lock ABUS Shield X+
RX Hardware RX Chip (für RX Services)*
Frame size [cm] universal*

The specification table indicates all available components for this model – not just the basic equipment. Some of the options listed are only available for a surcharge. For more information, see the Configurator. Riese & Müller reserves the right to make technical modifications as well as changes to the shape, colour and/or weight within reasonable limits.

* May differ depending on the availability in your country, design or configuration of the model.
row.shared.cargo-option-1-card:
Flex Box

£373.00

The Flex Box is an extension of the Basic Box (45 by 30 cm) for transporting larger loads and offers numerous transport options both when folded out and in. When collapsed, it is high enough to transport a regular drinks crate. And when folded out, its extended area of approx. 45 by 65 cm provides ample space for your weekly shopping or sports bag. It is fitted with a box lock that protects your load from unwanted access, if need be.
row.shared.cargo-option-2-card:
Child Seat

£187.00

The Flex Box is an extension of the Basic Box (45 by 30 cm) for transporting larger loads and offers numerous transport options both when folded out and in. When collapsed, it is high enough to transport a regular drinks crate. And when folded out, its extended area of approx. 45 by 65 cm provides ample space for your weekly shopping or sports bag. It is fitted with a box lock that protects your load from unwanted access, if need be.
row.shared.cargo-option-3-card:
Child Seat with Headrest

£233.00

The headrest offers additional safety, especially when transporting taller children. A sturdy bench seat that can be suspended in the Flex Box in two different ways serves as a child seat. Depending on its position, it will accommodate either one taller or two smaller children age seven or younger – reliably protected by the five-point seat belts. And the comfortable back cushion automatically folds in when the Flex Box is closed. However, when the headrest is fitted, it cannot be closed. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.
row.shared.cargo-option-4-card:
Child Cover

£187.00

The child cover reliably protects your younger passengers from the wind, rain and sun. It can be combined with the optional Flex Box, which can still be easily folded out and closed even when the child cover is fitted. The cover includes an additional panel that you can either use to darken the viewing window or as a rear panel. We have deliberately refrained from using fibreglass rods and PVC film material in the production process..
row.shared.cargo-option-5-card:
Cargo Bag

£280.00

The practical cargo bag with two handles is perfect for loading and unloading your cargo. Alternatively, pre-drilled holes mean that you can screw it permanently to the floor of the Basic Box. The cargo bag holds up to 90 litres. There is also a zipped pocket on its outside that can hold smaller items.
row.shared.cargo-option-6-card:
Rear Carrier

£94.00

The carrier with MIK system provides even more storage space: you can quickly and securely attach pannier racks, baskets, bike accessories, and even a dog basket, to the sturdy adapter plate. Accessories can be obtained from your dealer.
